text: Vincenzo Pellegrini (1575–1612) was an Italian painter of the late-Renaissance and Baroque periods, born at Perugia. He was a follower of Federico BarocciCatalogo dei quadri che si conservano nella Pinacoteca Vannucci in Perugia, by Galleria Nazionale dell'Umbria, (1903) page 65. ==References== Category:1575 births Category:1612 deaths Category:People from Urbino Category:16th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Umbrian painters Category:Italian Renaissance painters
title: Vincenzo Pellegrini
